All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AmphipolisFrame
    A UI class representing the final GUI of the game.
    Amphora
    A class representing an amphora tile.
    AmphoraLabel
    A UI class representing an AmphoraLabel.
    AmphoraTileArea
    A class representing an area of the board where amphora tiles can be placed.
    AmphoraTileAreaView
    A UI class representing a TileArea that holds amphora tiles.
    Archaeologist  
    Assistant
    A class representing an Assistant Card
    BackgroundPanel
    JPanel subclass that will act as the background of the board.
    Bag
    A Singleton class representing a Bag of tiles.
    Board
    A Singleton class representing the Board of the game.
    BoardPane
    A UI class representing the board of the game.
    Card
    An abstract class representing a Card of the game.
    Caryatid
    A class representing a Caryatid tile.
    Controller
    The Controller class coordinates interactions between the View and the Model.
    Digger
    A class representing a Digger card.
    Exceptions  
    Exceptions.IllegalTileTypeException  
    Exceptions.NoSuchTileFoundException  
    Exceptions.NotRemovableTileException  
    FindingTile
    An abstract class representing a finding type of tile.
    LandslideLabel  
    LandslideTile
    A class representing a Landslide tile.
    LandslideTileArea
    A class representing an area of the board where landslide tiles can be placed.
    LandslideTileAreaView
    A UI class representing a TileArea that holds landslide tiles.
    Main
    The Main class is the starting point of the game.
    Mosaic
    A class representing a Mosaic tile.
    MosaicLabel
    A UI class representing a MosaicLabel.
    MosaicTileArea
    A class representing an area of the board where mosaic tiles can be placed.
    MosaicTileAreaView
    A UI class representing a TileArea that holds mosaic tiles.
    Player
    A class representing a player.
    PlayerInfoPanel
    A UI class representing the Player Info panel which holds all necessary player info such as the player's name, active & inactive cards as well as buttons for interacting with the board.
    PlayerTilesGrid
    A UI class representing a player's tile collection as a grid.
    Professor
    A class representing a Professor card.
    Skeleton
    A class representing a SkeletonTile.
    SkeletonLabel
    A UI class representing a skeleton label.
    SkeletonTileArea
    A class representing an area of the board where skeleton tiles can be placed.
    SkeletonTileAreaView
    A UI class representing a TileArea that holds skeleton tiles.
    Sphinx
    A class representing a Sphinx tile.
    Statue
    An abstract class representing a Statue tile.
    StatueLabel
    A UI class representing a statue label.
    StatueTileArea
    A class representing an area of the board where statue tiles can be placed.
    StatueTileAreaView
    A UI class representing a TileArea that holds statue tiles.
    Tile
    An abstract class representing a Tile.
    TileArea<T extends Tile>
    A class representing an area of the board where tiles can be placed.
    TileArea
    A UI class representing a TileArea as a JPanel with grid which holds an array of Tile Labels.
    TileArea
    An abstract UI class representing a TileArea as a JPanel with grid which holds an array of Tile Labels.
    TileLabel
    An abstract UI class representing a Tile of the game which has an image and a counter keeping track of how many instances of that tile are present on the board.
